Crafting Luxury Outdoor Spaces in DFW

Bespoke decks, patios, and outdoor living spaces built with precision craftsmanship for North Texas homeowners.

How It Works

From Vision to Reality

A proven three-step process refined over nearly two decades of building premium outdoor spaces across DFW.

01

Design

We start with a free consultation to understand your vision, lifestyle, and property. You receive a detailed custom design plan before any work begins.

02

Build

Our craftsmen bring your design to life using premium materials from Trex, TimberTech, and other trusted brands — with meticulous attention to every detail.

03

Enjoy

Step into your new outdoor retreat. Built to withstand the Texas elements and designed to impress, your space is ready for years of relaxation and entertainment.

Start With a Free Consultation
Your Vision, Our Craft

Your outdoor space, reimagined.

A well-built outdoor living area increases your property value, gives you a year-round entertainment space, and is engineered to handle the Texas heat, storms, and everything in between.

See Our Work
What We Do

Our Services

Custom Decks & Terraces

Transform your outdoor space with bespoke decks and terraces in composite or hardwood, built to handle North Texas heat, storms, and sun. Our designs blend seamlessly with your home's architecture, creating stunning elevated living areas.

View Projects

Luxury Patios & Outdoor Living

Experience the epitome of outdoor comfort with patios built from concrete pavers, natural stone, or stamped concrete. Add a covered structure to beat the Texas summer heat and enjoy your outdoor living space year-round.

View Projects

Pergolas & Shade Structures

Add elegance and functionality with custom pergolas in cedar, aluminum, or louvered designs. Our shade structures provide the perfect balance of sun and shade while enhancing your landscape's visual appeal.

View Projects

Water Features & Pool Surrounds

Elevate your outdoor oasis with custom pools, spas, and captivating water elements. Our designs integrate seamlessly with your landscape, creating a luxurious retreat in your own backyard.

View Projects

Outdoor Kitchens & Entertainment

Bring the heart of your home outside with fully-equipped outdoor kitchens and entertainment spaces. From built-in grills to cozy fire pits, we design areas perfect for gathering and making memories.

View Projects

Fence & Boundary Solutions

Enhance your property with a custom fence solution that blends privacy and aesthetic. From elegant garden boundaries to robust perimeters, we design fences that complement your landscape and define your personal sanctuary.

View Projects

Why Us

Why choose us?

01 Fort Worth's Trusted Craftsmen Since 2005
Founded in 2005 and headquartered in Benbrook, our well-trained craftsmen have delivered premium outdoor spaces across greater DFW for nearly two decades.
02 Commitment to Customer Satisfaction
Rated 5 stars on Google and recommended on Nextdoor, our clients highlight our attention to detail, expertise, and professionalism throughout every project.
03 Free Consultation & Quality Guarantee
Get started with a free consultation. We build with industry-leading materials from Trex, TimberTech, and other trusted brands — and stand behind every project we complete.

Testimonials

What DFW Homeowners Say

Averaging 5 stars across 50+ reviews

Our Guarantee

What We Stand Behind

Free Design Consultation

No cost, no obligation. We visit your property, discuss your vision, and provide a detailed design plan.

Premium Materials Only

We build exclusively with industry-leading brands: Trex, TimberTech, Fortress, and other trusted manufacturers.

Licensed & Insured

Full liability coverage and workers’ comp on every job. Your property and investment are protected.

Workmanship Guarantee

We stand behind every project we complete. If something isn’t right, we make it right.
